comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The May 9, 1914 Washington Times (evening) reports that they had been in Washington DC and were heading south to Richmond and Atlanta. chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn84026749/1914-05-09/ed-...
